question: which week of the year {year} has the {stats} {method} {col} level ?
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    data = main_data[main_data["Timestamp"].dt.year == {code_year}]
    data = data.groupby(data["Timestamp"].dt.isocalendar().week)["{code_col}"].{code_method}.reset_index()
    data = data.sort_values(by="{code_col}")
    print(data.iloc[{code_stats}]["week"])


true_code()
